titlestmt.titleproper: Album of Photographs of the American Embassy Residence in Tokyo, Japan 1964-1966
Album of Photographs of the American Embassy Residence in Tokyo, Japan

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Album of Photographs of the American Embassy Residence in Tokyo, Japan 1964-1966
did.abstract: Silk photograph album with fourteen mounted, mostly black and white photographs with typescript captions. Accompanied by a letter of transmittal to University of Arizona President Richard A. Harvill from Ambassador Edwin O. Reischauer.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Album of Photographs of the American Embassy Residence in Tokyo, Japan (AZ 282). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Taken on the occasion of a loan exhibition of works of art from the Gallagher, Pfeiffer, and Burr Collections at The University of Arizona.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Silk photograph album with fourteen mounted, mostly black and white photographs with typescript captions. Accompanied by a letter of transmittal to University of Arizona President Richard A. Harvill from Ambassador Edwin O. Reischauer.
